trans-unit.source: Manipulates a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> that has been applied by a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard" /> action.
trans-unit.target: Manipula um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> que foi aplicado por uma ação <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard" />.

trans-unit.source: Pause, Resume, Stop, or Otherwise Control a Storyboard Interactively
trans-unit.target: Pausar, retomar, parar ou controlar um Storyboard interativamente

trans-unit.source: To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> interactively, set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> and use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) to control it by referencing its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para pausar, retomar ou controlar um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> interativamente, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> propriedade do seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> e usar um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> objeto (como <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) controlá-lo fazendo referência a seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> cannot be interactively controlled after it is begun.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> não for especificado, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> não pode ser controlado interativamente depois que ele é iniciado.

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-use-event-triggers-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Consulte [como: usar gatilhos de eventos para controlar um Storyboard após iniciar](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-use-event-triggers-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md) para obter mais informações.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard" /> that began the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> you want to interactively control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name" /> do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard" /> que iniciou o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> que você deseja controlar de forma interativa.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard" /> that began the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> you want to interactively control.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name" /> do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard" /> que começou a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> você deseja controlar interativamente.
